Room.Name: Lost in the Respitial Sea
Room.ShortDescription: You are floating on the waves of a vast sea, hopelessly lost.
Room.LongDescription: The sea is calm and you seem to have no trouble swimming for hours at a time. However, you are lost, you know. Each wave you see looks pretty much like the last one and you haven't seen land in a long time. At night, the stars may help you navigate, but then again, maybe not.
